elements.title: getting the James Webb Space Telescope into orbit (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that getting the James Webb Space Telescope into orbit (launch pictured) consumed far less fuel than was planned, effectively doubling its expected operational life?

elements.title: Georgina Kennedy (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that 2022 Commonwealth Games women's squash gold medallist Georgina Kennedy was once a promising runner, ranked number one in England at the 1500 metres, before focusing on squash?

elements.title: Madera Sugar Pine Company (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a Chinatown in the logging community of Sugar Pine was intentionally burned down by the Madera Sugar Pine Company in 1922?

elements.title: Patrick Degorce (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that hedge fund manager Patrick Degorce was an early investor in Moderna, with the hope that they could find a cure for his wife's stage-IV lung cancer?

elements.title: The Stranger (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ingrid Andress said that she wished she had included a parrot which startled her in the music video for her single "The Stranger"?

elements.title: Elden Ring (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the writer of Elden Ring compared the game's mythology to using a dungeon master's handbook in a tabletop RPG?

elements.title: Victoria Ivleva (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Victoria Ivleva is the only person to have taken photographs inside the destroyed nuclear reactor of the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant?

elements.title: a Montana TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the owner of a Montana TV station changed the name of his company because he was asked why his license plate read "SUNBELT"?
